channel.title: Dropbox Sign, Fax, and Forms Status - Incident History

item.title: Maintenance with an outage for Sign and Fax
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Scheduled Maintenance Summary: The website will be undergoing scheduled maintenance from Mar 30, 21:00 - 22:00 PDT and users may experience temporary service interruptions.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 30, 21:00 - 22:00 PDT

Feb 2, 12:54 PST
Scheduled - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

item.title: We are currently investigating performance problems with our site and API endpoints
item.content:encoded:
Feb 1, 14:32 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 1, 14:20 PST
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Feb 1, 09:03 PST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Feb 1, 07:55 PST
Investigating - We are currently investigating performance problems with our site and API endpoints. The site is operational, but performing outside of our expectations. Thank you for your patience while we work to resolve this issue.

Investigating - We are currently investigating performance problems with our site and API endpoints. The site and the API is operational, but users may experience slowness. Thank you for your patience while we work to resolve this issue

Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jan 6, 21:00 PST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 22, 08:21 PDT
Scheduled - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

item.title: Get Signatures is not working as expected.
item.content:encoded:
Dec 8, 13:51 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 8, 09:51 PST
Investigating - We are currently experiencing issues with the Get Signatures feature. We are working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. Thank you for your patience.

item.title: Users experiencing errors for misplaced and misaligned signature field elements when using form fields per documents
item.content:encoded:
Nov 9, 16:44 PST
Resolved - The issue is now resolved and has rolled back the updates that were made yesterday. Our team has identified that the errors were specific to requests using the legacy coordinate system for the form fields per document parameter.

Nov 9, 13:58 PST
Investigating - Users are experiencing errors for misplaced and misaligned signature field elements when using form fields per documents. This started after our release yesterday and our team is working on a fix.

item.title: Some workflows in Forms were not completing as expected for some users
item.content:encoded:
Nov 2, 13:50 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 2, 08:47 PDT
Update - We are continuing to actively monitor the fix. Thanks for your patience.

Nov 1, 09:20 PDT
Monitoring - Some workflows in Forms were not completing as expected for some users. We identified the issue and a fix has been implemented. We are actively monitoring the fix.

Oct 18, 06:17 PDT
Investigating - Users may experience their documents not displaying on the Documents page when using search. We are working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. Thank you for your patience.

item.title: SMS signature requests may not be working as expected.
item.content:encoded:
Sep 27, 14:01 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 26, 14:58 PDT
Identified - On Friday, September 26, 2023, at 14:45 PDT, we posted a status page update about issues with SMS signature requests. We have since removed that update as it was originally misclassified. Currently, the issue has been identified and we are actively working with a third party on a solution. Until this is resolved, please rely on email signature requests.

item.title: There's an increase in error during signing.
item.content:encoded:
Sep 15, 16:40 PDT
Resolved - Our team has resolved the issue. Requests may have been impacted if Text Tags were used between 17:00 - 22:00 UTC. Requests using Text Tags can now be sent normally.

Sep 15, 15:20 PDT
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Sep 15, 15:20 PDT
Monitoring - We experienced an issue with our API and Text Tags feature that blocked both signing and sending new requests. We've identified the issue and it has now been resolved. We will continue to monitor the fix.

Sep 15, 13:59 PDT
Investigating - We are currently experiencing issue with signing. We are working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. Thank you for your patience.

item.title: Signature requests experiencing misplaced/missing fields and signatures
item.content:encoded:
Sep 14, 17:47 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 14, 11:31 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 14, 08:32 PDT
Update - We apologize for the delay on this issue, weâ€™re still actively investigating. Thanks for your patience.

Sep 13, 22:54 PDT
Update - Our team is still investigating these reports, and we'll continue to provide updates as we have them. This issue is not wide spread and most documents are unaffected.

Sep 13, 20:27 PDT
Update - Investigation still in progress. Thanks for your patience.

Sep 13, 19:10 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate and will reach out with another update shortly.

Sep 13, 18:41 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate the issue.

Sep 13, 18:09 PDT
Investigating - We are currently receiving reports of some users experiencing misplaced/missing fields and signatures in some of their requests. We are working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. Thank you for your patience.

item.title: Documents page listing only a single page of documents
item.content:encoded:
Sep 7, 10:03 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 7, 08:54 PDT
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue and will have another update shortly.

Sep 7, 08:02 PDT
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Sep 7, 07:36 PDT
Investigating - We are currently experiencing the Documents page listing only a single page of documents. This is only a display issue and you may not be able to see all of your documents displayed on this page. We are working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. Thank you for your patience.

item.title: Some signature requests with group signers are missing fields
item.content:encoded:
Aug 21, 15:35 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 21, 12:04 PDT
Investigating - We are currently experiencing some issues with group signers and signature requests. Signature requests that do not use the group signer functionality are not impacted. We are actively investigating this and will update the status page as we learn more. Thank you for your patience.
